body:
This adds the updated Python bindings for the current versions preCICE (https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/19264 and https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/21166)

The installation procedure has been improved such that we need the patch `deactivate-version-check-via-pip.patch` only for versions `<= 2.1.1.1` of the bindings. This is reflected accordingly in the Spack recipe.
title: [bad merge] py-pyprecice: Add version 2.1.1.2 and 2.2.0.1
